alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Dane; Dodge; Fond du Lac; Green Lake; Iowa; Marquette; Sauk (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued February 18 at 5:59PM CST until February 18 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... Green Lake County in south central Wisconsin... Western Fond du Lac County in east central Wisconsin... Northeastern Iowa County in south central Wisconsin... Columbia County in south central Wisconsin... Northwestern Dane County in south central Wisconsin... East central Marquette County in south central Wisconsin... Sauk County in south central Wisconsin... Northwestern Dodge County in southeastern Wisconsin... * Until 700 PM CST. * At 558 PM CST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Redgranite to near Muscoda, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Poor visibility in heavy snow and blowing snow. Wind gusts greater than 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar and webcams. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. *This includes the following highways... Interstates 90 and 94. Locations impacted include... Western Madison, Middleton, Beaver Dam, Waunakee, Baraboo, Waupun, Ripon, Windsor, Berlin, Columbus, Prairie Du Sac, Sauk City, Lake Wisconsin, Deforest, Cross Plains, Lodi, Poynette, Randolph, Fall River and Mazomanie. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Reduce your speed and turn on headlights! During snow squalls, the visibility may suddenly drop to near zero in whiteout conditions.

area.areaDesc: Columbia; Dane; Dodge; Fond du Lac; Green Lake; Iowa; Marquette; Sauk
